title: Linux and Unix based
extract: Linux is a Unix-Like Operating System developed by Linus Torvalds and thousands of others. BSD is a UNIX operating system that for legal reasons must be called Unix-Like. OS X is a graphical UNIX Operating System developed by Apple Inc. ... And it is based on BSD.Nov 16, 2010
extract_html: Linux is a Unix-Like Operating System developed by Linus Torvalds and thousands of others. BSD is a UNIX operating system that for legal reasons must be called Unix-Like. OS X is a graphical UNIX Operating System developed by Apple Inc. ... And it is based on BSD.Nov 16, 2010
